github_body:
General changes:
    * #286 Upgraded internals to the latest and greatest.
Map changes:
    * #299 When editing a route cooperatively, selecting a Pull will no longer change all enemy names into the currently logged in user name.
    * #300 You can now set a map icon's comment to show permanently. Enemy tooltips are now also no longer linger around if you mouse over them quickly.
    * #306 Enemies that are not part of your Pulls are now faded out to help visibility.
Bugfixes:
    * #304 Ensured a Pull color is always set - this was causing some issues in various places if a color is missing.
discord_body:
v3.0.3 (2020/05/26)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.3)
General changes:
    * #286 Upgraded internals to the latest and greatest.

Map changes:
    * #299 When editing a route cooperatively, selecting a Pull will no longer change all enemy names into the currently logged in user name.
    * #300 You can now set a map icon's comment to show permanently. Enemy tooltips are now also no longer linger around if you mouse over them quickly.
    * #306 Enemies that are not part of your Pulls are now faded out to help visibility.

Bugfixes:
    * #304 Ensured a Pull color is always set - this was causing some issues in various places if a color is missing.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.3](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.3)

General changes:
* [\#286](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/286) Upgraded internals to the latest and greatest.

Map changes:
* [\#299](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/299) When editing a route cooperatively, selecting a Pull will no longer change all enemy names into the currently logged in user name.
* [\#300](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/300) You can now set a map icon's comment to show permanently. Enemy tooltips are now also no longer linger around if you mouse over them quickly.
* [\#306](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/306) Enemies that are not part of your Pulls are now faded out to help visibility.

Bugfixes:
* [\#304](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/304) Ensured a Pull color is always set - this was causing some issues in various places if a color is missing.

changes.change: Upgraded internals to the latest and greatest.
When editing a route cooperatively, selecting a Pull will no longer change all enemy names into the currently logged in user name.
You can now set a map icon's comment to show permanently. Enemy tooltips are now also no longer linger around if you mouse over them quickly.
Enemies that are not part of your Pulls are now faded out to help visibility.
Ensured a Pull color is always set - this was causing some issues in various places if a color is missing.
